features: Easy installation—slides behind luggage pass-through and holds into place with hook-and-loop fasteners.
Padded for stability and comfort with heavy loads.
Adjust vertically to optimize comfort with different sized torsos.
Adjustable for wide range of waist sizes from 29” to 52”.
Padded straps quickly stow away when not in-use by tucking behind the luggage pass-through. No dangling straps—strap end tucks away into sleeve on left side.
Fastens with durable, easy-to-operate aluminum G-hook hardware. G-hook allows quick cinching and loosening.
2 Capture Clip mounting points on the right side. (Capture sold separately)
Fits Everyday Backpack v2 models only. (Everyday Backpack 20/30L and Everyday Backpack Zip 15/20L)
Does not fit Everyday Backpack v1, Everyday Totepack, or Peak Design Travel Backpack.
